1.0.name: wordpress/my-tag-cloud
1.0.description: My tag cloud provides you with a widget that actually gives you the ability to list the tags of your posts in a diiferent way than a tag cloud. It list the first 5, most popular or alphapbeticaly depending on the preferences, as an unordered list and the rest are put in a dropdown.
